name: ShootingStar.
description:
Let's jump over the rotating gear and aim for the goal!
Tempo Good jumps become habit An exhilarating jump action game!
How far can you meter star (shooting star) of you?
Let's jump the gear rhythm well and aim for the goal gear of the deepest part!

Feature
- It is a point rhythm game how you can jump at a good tempo.
- Simple. It is an action game that is fashionable, fun, and capable of being tested.
- Because it is an action game of a relaxed theme, you can enjoy it for a long time comfortably.
